gpbStat 0.1.0

    • ltcrcbd

Analysis of Line x Tester data laid out in Alpha Lattice experimental design

Source: R/ltcaplha.R
ltcalpha.Rd

Used for analyzing the line x tester data containing only crosses laid out in alpha lattice design

ltcalpha(data, block, replication, line, tester, y)

Arguments

data

dataframe containing following variables
block

number of blocks per replication
replication

number of replications
line

number of lines
tester

number of testers
y

a trait of interest

Value

Results of line by tester analysis

Details

Analyzing the line by tester data only using the data from crosses which are evaluated in alpha lattice design.

Author

Nandan Patil

Examples

library(gpbStat)
data(alphalt)
results1 = ltcalpha(alphalt, replication, block, line, tester, yield)

#> 
#> Analysis of Line x Tester:  yield 
results1
